job_description:
JOB DESCRIPTION :

-  Supervision and tracking of construction works as assigned by superiors
- Mastering the sequence of steps performed on the site acceptance test in accordance with the approved procedure
- Manage subcontractors.
- Notes supervision diary;
- Guidance and counseling Contractor established construction measures. -
- Browse preliminary construction measures established by the Contractor;
- Perform other duties: Perform other duties as required by superiors
- Others job assisted by Manager.
